text.rules:
Game rules 
Your main goal is to protect yourself and live as much as possible. 
You can kill them or just dodge shots. 
Avoid bombs(TNT), they blast with range 4*4 when you shot them. 
Good luck.
text.controls:
Game controls 
* Move top - W 
* Move down - S 
* Move left - A 
* Move right - D 
* Quit game - Escape
